General.Name: Cho Kwang Pain
General.Description: Chokwang Paint Ltd. manufactures and sells paints and chemicals in South Korea and internationally. It offers architectural, floor and waterproofing, heavy duty, industrial, wood, plastic, and UV curing paints; powder coatings, adhesives, electronic materials, and car maintenance products; and energy saving products. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
